Serialized Form

  • Package Core

    • Class Core.Field

      class Field extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • autoresize
          boolean autoresize
          determines whether the field should be autoresized when the window size is changed
        • background
          String background
          Path to Background. Null for no background.
        • cl
          ComponentListener cl
          Redraws field if window size is changed.
        • currentMouseX
          int currentMouseX
          X of last mouse click. Will reset after each check.
        • currentMouseY
          int currentMouseY
          Y of last mouse click. Will reset after each check.
        • fieldHeight
          int fieldHeight
          Height of the field
        • fieldWidth
          int fieldWidth
          Width of the field
        • lockScroll
          boolean lockScroll
          Checks whether the scroll is locked to an object
        • lockScrollX
          boolean lockScrollX
          Checks whether the scroll is locked to an object on the X axis
        • lockScrollY
          boolean lockScrollY
          Checks whether the scroll is locked to an object on the Y axis
        • ml
          MouseListener ml
        • mml
          MouseMotionListener mml
          Event handler every time mouse is clicked.
        • mouseWheelRotation
          int mouseWheelRotation
          Rotation of the mouseWheel Up is -1 and Down is 1
        • mouseWheelScroll
          int mouseWheelScroll
          Amount scrolled with the mouseWheel
        • mouseX
          int mouseX
          X of last mouse click
        • mouseY
          int mouseY
          y of last mouse click
        • moveOutOfScroll
          boolean moveOutOfScroll
          Checks whether the objects out of scrolls should continue moving Caution: enabling this will destroy the performance
        • mwl
          MouseWheelListener mwl
        • newSprites
          ArrayList<Sprite> newSprites
        • observers
          ArrayList<Observer> observers
          list of observers for observer pattern
        • rcurrentMouseX
          int rcurrentMouseX
          X of last mouse click. Will reset after each check.
        • rcurrentMouseY
          int rcurrentMouseY
          Y of last mouse click. Will reset after each check.
        • recentDraw
          boolean recentDraw
          flag set on a draw.
        • rmouseX
          int rmouseX
          X of last mouse click
        • rmouseY
          int rmouseY
          Y of last mouse click
        • scrollSprite
          Sprite scrollSprite
          Object to which the scroll is locked
        • scrollx
          int scrollx
          Horizontal scroll applied
        • scrolly
          int scrolly
          Vertical scroll applied
        • sprites
          ArrayList<Sprite> sprites
          List of Sprites.
        • updateOutOfScroll
          boolean updateOutOfScroll
          Checks whether the objects out of scrolls should continue updating. False will improve performacne
        • verbose
          boolean verbose
          Activates verbose mode
        • w
          Window w

    • Class Core.PhysicBody

      class PhysicBody extends Sprite implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • colliding
          ArrayList<Sprite> colliding
          marks this sprite as a phantom. Phantom sprites are used only for physic calculations
        • constantForce
          double[] constantForce
          force vector, measured in pixels/frame^2
        • drag
          double[] drag
          drag vector, measured in proportion (from -1, to 1)
        • force
          double[] force
          force vector, measured in pixels/frame^2
        • physicBody
          boolean physicBody
          determines if this sprite is a physicBody. physicBodies move according to a force and velocity vector and collide among selves.
        • trigColliding
          ArrayList<Sprite> trigColliding
        • trigger
          boolean trigger
          marks this sprite as a trigger. Triggers move according to physics but do not stop when colliding with another physicbody
        • velocity
          double[] velocity
          velocity vector, measured in pixels/frame

    • Class Core.Sprite

      class Sprite extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • angle
          double angle
          The rotating angle in degrees
        • circle
          boolean circle
          angle passa a ser el radi del cercle TODO
        • collisionBox
          boolean collisionBox
          checks whether this sprite has a collision box distinct to its drawing box
        • color
          Color color
          color of a colored sprite, in RGB-Alpha format.
        • colorSprite
          boolean colorSprite
          determines if this sprite is a color Sprite. Color Sprites are just squares with one color
        • currentImg
          int currentImg
          position of the image on the img array that should be accessed currently
        • delete
          boolean delete
          marks this sprite to be deleted. Deleted sprites aren't drawn and they do not collide.
        • drawingBoxExtraDown
          int drawingBoxExtraDown
        • drawingBoxExtraLeft
          int drawingBoxExtraLeft
          marks this Sprite to be deleted.
        • drawingBoxExtraRight
          int drawingBoxExtraRight
        • drawingBoxExtraUp
          int drawingBoxExtraUp
        • flippedX
          boolean flippedX
          marks this sprite as one that is flipped. Physics works correctly tho
        • flippedY
          boolean flippedY
        • font
          Font font
          Font for the text if the Sprite is used as text
        • ignoredLayers
          HashSet<Integer> ignoredLayers
          set of the ignored layers. Objects can ignore certain layers and won't collide with them
        • img
          Image img
        • imgArray
          String[] imgArray
          array of images, needed if a single sprite has several images.
        • internalDelete
          boolean internalDelete
        • layer
          int layer
          layer of the object. Objects can ignore certain layers and won't collide with them. Defaults to 0
        • name
          String name
          the name of the sprite
        • orderInLayer
          Integer orderInLayer
          Determines the order in the field. The higher the value the more in front will be. The highest value will be on the forefront and the lowest on the background.
        • palleteSwap
          boolean palleteSwap
          marks this sprite as a sprite with a palleteSwap
        • path
          String path
          The path to the image to that Sprite
        • solid
          boolean solid
          Specifies whether this Sprite is solid. Non-solid sprites will not collide.
        • swapList
          ArrayList<Color> swapList
          List of the required swaps. The even numbers will be replaced by the inmediately after number
        • text
          boolean text
          Specifies whether this sprite is text. Text won't use an image path and will print the String specified as path.
        • textColor
          int textColor
          Color for the text if the Sprite is used as text
        • unscrollable
          boolean unscrollable
          Specifies whether this sprite is unscrollable. Unscrollables won't be scrolled ever. Used for HUD or fixed objects
        • useImgArray
          boolean useImgArray
          checks if an img Array should be used instead of a single image
        • verbose
          boolean verbose
          Activates verbose mode
        • visible
          boolean visible
        • x1
          float x1
          The horizontal position in the field of the upper-left pixel in the sprite
        • x2
          float x2
          The horizontal position in the field of the bottom-right pixel in the sprite
        • y1
          float y1
          The vertical position in the field of the upper-left pixel in the sprite
        • y2
          float y2
          The vertical position in the field of the bottom-right pixel in the sprite

    • Class Core.Window

      class Window extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • actLabels
          boolean actLabels
          Checks whether labels should appear at the right of the screen
        • audioInputStream
          AudioInputStream audioInputStream
          audio player
        • currentKeyPressed
          char currentKeyPressed
          Deprecated.
          Last keyboard char pressed, resets every time on check
        • currentMusic
          String currentMusic
          current Music being played
        • debugLabel
          boolean debugLabel
          Checks whether the debug label, a label with mouse and keyboard input, should appear
        • field
          Field field
          Pixel Field used
        • ka
          KeyAdapter ka
          Keyboard integration. Detects pressed keys and returns them as a set.
        • keyPressed
          char keyPressed
          Last keyboard char pressed, even if it's not currently pressed
        • keysDown
          Set<Character> keysDown
          set that registers every key pressed event. Deleted on polling.
        • keysUp
          Set<Character> keysUp
          set that registers every key released event. Deleted on polling.
        • labelpanel
          JPanel labelpanel
          Panel containing all the labels
        • labels
          String[] labels
          Content of the labels
        • musicClip
          Clip musicClip
          music clip to be played
        • musicVolume
          int musicVolume
          volume of the music, in a scale from 0 to 100
        • observers
          ArrayList<Observer> observers
          list of observers for observer pattern
        • pressedKeys
          Set<Character> pressedKeys
          set with every key CURRENTLY pressed.
        • secondBoard
          boolean secondBoard
          Horizontal size of the window
        • sfxClip
          Clip sfxClip
        • sfxVolume
          int sfxVolume
          volume of the sfx, in a scale from 0 to 100
        • tpanel
          JPanel tpanel
          tpanel used as container for both boards if double board mode is activated
        • verbose
          boolean verbose
          Activates verbose mode
